        Creates the hierachy of an operators wrt. Operator.getParent().

        public static java.util.List<OperatorContainer> collectContainers​(Operator operator)

        Returns:
        the hierarchy with the first element being the top-level/outermost container

      • assertEqualInputs

        public static void assertEqualInputs​(Operator o1,
                                     Operator o2)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Compares the inputs of two operators and passes quietly if they are identical.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the operators differ in their inputs

                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Compares the outputs of two operators and passes quietly if they are identical.

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the operators differ in their outputs

        Collect Operators within this instance that are connected to an outer InputSlot, or the source Operator.
        Parameters:
        operatorContainer - whose input Operators are to be collected
        Returns:
        the collected Operators
